languages.text: "Смотри. Изучай. Впитывай. Тебе понадобится время, чтобы освоиться на корабле и в своем новом положении. Со временем я найду для тебя подходящий пост — так же, как я нашла позицию и для Эделя. До тех пор — считай себя моим помощником".

traits.locale_text: "Смотри. Изучай. Впитывай. Тебе понадобится время, чтобы освоиться на корабле и в своем новом положении. Со временем я найду для тебя подходящий пост — также, как я нашла позицию и для Эделя. До тех пор — считай себя моим помощником".

languages.text: "Observe. Learn. Absorb. It will take time for you to find your bearings aboard this vessel and in your new position. Eventually, I will find a post that suits you as I did for Edelthrad. Until that time comes, consider yourself my aide."
languages.original_text: "Смотри. Изучай. Впитывай. Тебе понадобится время, чтобы освоиться на корабле и в своем новом положении. Со временем я найду для тебя подходящий пост — так же, как я нашла позицию и для Эделя. До тех пор — считай себя моим помощником".

traits.locale_text: "Observe. Learn. Absorb. It will take time for you to find your bearings aboard this vessel and in your new position. Eventually, I will find a post that suits you as I did for Edelthrad. Until that time comes, consider yourself my aide."

"Observe. Learn. Absorb. It will take time for you to find your bearings aboard this vessel and in your new position. Eventually, I will find a post that suits you as I did for Edelthrad. Until that time comes, consider yourself my aide."

"Observe. Learn. Absorb. It will take time for you to find your bearings aboard this vessel and in your new position. Eventually, I will find a post that suits you as I did for Edelthrad. Until that time comes, consider yourself my aide."

"Observe. Learn. Absorb. It will take time for you to find your bearings aboard this vessel and in your new position. Eventually, I will find a post that suits you as I did for Edelthrad. Until that time comes, consider yourself my aide."

languages.text: “仔细观察，学习，了解一切。你需要花些时间，才能在这艘船上找到你的新角色。到了最后，我可以给你找个合适的职位，就像我为艾德萨德找到适合他的职位那样。在此之前，你可以先担任我的助手。”
languages.original_text: "Observe. Learn. Absorb. It will take time for you to find your bearings aboard this vessel and in your new position. Eventually, I will find a post that suits you as I did for Edelthrad. Until that time comes, consider yourself my aide."

traits.locale_text: “仔细观察，学习，了解一切。你需要花些时间，才能在这艘船上找到你的新角色。到了最后，我可以给你找个合适的职位，就像我为艾德萨德找到适合他的职位那样。在此之前，你可以先担任我的助手。”

languages.text: «Observa. Aprende. Absorbe. Tardarás un tiempo en orientarte, tanto en la nave como en tu nuevo cargo. Con el tiempo encontraré una posición ideal para ti como he hecho con Edelthrad. Hasta entonces, harás de ayudante».
languages.original_text: "Observe. Learn. Absorb. It will take time for you to find your bearings aboard this vessel and in your new position. Eventually, I will find a post that suits you as I did for Edelthrad. Until that time comes, consider yourself my aide."

traits.locale_text: «Observa. Aprende. Absorbe. Tardarás un tiempo en orientarte, tanto en la nave como en tu nuevo cargo. Con el tiempo encontraré una posición ideal para ti como he hecho con Edelthrad. Hasta entonces, harás de ayudante».

languages.text: 「観察し、学習して、吸収して。あなたはこの船で新しい立場に立つまでには時間がかかるでしょう。しかし、エデルスラドの時と同じように、私はいずれあなたに適した役職を見つける。その時が来るまで、私の側近だと思ってくれ」
languages.original_text: "Observe. Learn. Absorb. It will take time for you to find your bearings aboard this vessel and in your new position. Eventually, I will find a post that suits you as I did for Edelthrad. Until that time comes, consider yourself my aide."

traits.locale_text: 「観察し、学習して、吸収してください。あなたがこの船に乗って新しい立場に立つまでには時間がかかるでしょう。エデルスラドの時と同じように、最終的には私はあなたに適した役職を見つけます。その時が来るまで、私の側近だと思ってください」
「観察し、学習して、吸収して。あなたはこの船で新しい立場に立つまでには時間がかかるでしょう。しかし、エデルスラドの時と同じように、私はいずれあなたに適した役職を見つける。その時が来るまで、私の側近だと思ってくれ」

languages.text: « Observez. Apprenez. Absorbez. Il vous faudra du temps pour trouver vos repères à bord du vaisseau et dans vos nouvelles fonctions. Je finirai par trouver un poste qui vous conviendra, comme je l'ai fait pour Edelthrad. En attendant, considérez-vous comme mon {mf|assistant|assistante}. »
languages.original_text: "Observe. Learn. Absorb. It will take time for you to find your bearings aboard this vessel and in your new position. Eventually, I will find a post that suits you as I did for Edelthrad. Until that time comes, consider yourself my aide."

traits.locale_text: « Observez. Apprenez. Absorbez. Il vous faudra du temps pour trouver vos repaires à bord du vaisseau et dans vos nouvelles fonctions. Je finirai par trouver un poste qui vous conviendra, comme je l'ai fait pour Edelthrad. En attendant, considérez-vous comme mon {mf|assistant|assistante}. »

languages.text: "Beobachten. Lernen. Aufnehmen. Ihr werdet Zeit brauchen, um Euch an Bord dieses Schiffs und in Eurer neuen Position zurechtzufinden. Irgendwann habe ich dann einen passenden Posten für Euch, genau wie für Edelthrad. Bis dahin solltet Ihr Euch als {mf|meinen Assistenten|meine Assistentin} betrachten."
languages.original_text: "Observe. Learn. Absorb. It will take time for you to find your bearings aboard this vessel and in your new position. Eventually, I will find a post that suits you as I did for Edelthrad. Until that time comes, consider yourself my aide."

traits.locale_text: "Beobachten. Lernen. Aufnehmen. Ihr werdet Zeit brauchen, um Euch an Bord dieses Schiffs und in Eurer neuen Position zurechtzufinden. Irgendwann habe ich dann einen passenden Posten für Euch, genau wie für Edelthrad. Bis dahin solltet Ihr Euch als {mf|meinen Assistenten|meine Assistentin} betrachten."

languages.text: "Gözlemle. Öğren. Kavra. Gemiye ve yeni mevkine alışman zaman alacaktır. Eninde sonunda sana da Edelthrad'a yaptığım gibi uygun bir görev yeri bulacağım. O vakit gelene dek kendini emir erim say."
languages.original_text: "Observe. Learn. Absorb. It will take time for you to find your bearings aboard this vessel and in your new position. Eventually, I will find a post that suits you as I did for Edelthrad. Until that time comes, consider yourself my aide."

traits.locale_text: "Gözlemle. Öğren. Kavra. Gemiye ve yeni mevkine alışman zaman alacaktır. Eninde sonunda sana da Edelthrad'a yaptığım gibi uygun bir görev yeri bulacağım. O vakit gelene dek kendini emir erim say."

languages.original_text: "Observe. Learn. Absorb. It will take time for you to find your bearings aboard this vessel and in your new position. Eventually, I will find a post that suits you as I did for Edelthrad. Until that time comes, consider yourself my aide."
